name: People That Rhyme Quiz | People | 10 Questions

questions.text: Barbara Bain starred in 'Mission Impossible'; she also starred in another tv series. Which one?
questions.explanation:
'Space 1999'.

	It didn't do particularly well. The other choices were also tv series.

questions.text: The Caine was the name of a ship in 'The Caine Mutiny'. Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Herman Wouk.

	Good novel and movie.

questions.text: What literary character is often referred to as the 'melancholy Dane'?
questions.explanation:
Hamlet.

	Remember: he's a prince of Denmark.

questions.text: Which movie stars an actress named 'Jayne'?
questions.explanation:
'Will Success Spoil Rock Hunter?'.

	Jayne Mansfield. 'Sea Wife' is Joan Collins. 'Laura' is Gene Tierney'. 'Furlough' is Janet Leigh.

questions.text: Which movie series starred Marjorie Main?
questions.explanation:
Ma and Pa Kettle.

	If you like that sort of thing.

'Miracle on 34th Street'.

	His claim to being in a 'classic'.

questions.text: Johnny Sain teamed with what other pitcher for an effective one-two punch for his team?
questions.explanation:
Warren Spahn.

	'Spahn and Sain and pray for rain'.

questions.text: In what novel (and movie) is Sybil Vane a character?
questions.explanation:
The Picture of Dorian Gray.

	By Oscar Wilde. Angela Lansbury played the part in the movie.

questions.text: Which movie stars John Wayne as a character named 'Quirt'?
questions.explanation:
'Angel and the Badman'.

	'Grit' was 'Rooster Cogburn'. 'Bravo' was 'Chance'. 'Stagecoach' was 'The Ringo Kid'.
